titleStmt.title: A warning-piece for the unruly in two sermons at the metropolitical visitation of the most reverend father in God, Richard Lord Archbishop of York, held at Preston in Amondernes in Lancashire, and there preached, the former on that day, the latter the day following / by Seth Bushell.
titleStmt.author: Bushell, Seth, 1621-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Cademan and Tho. Passinger,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
